Educate the next generation, spending on education is a valuable investment. It benefits the whole of humanity. An educated person will help others with their problems using knowledge acquired from education.

Sleeping under an insecticide treated mosquito net prevents you from being bitten by mosquitoes. When that net is treated with insecticide, it provides greater protection by repelling mosquitoes and killing those that land on it. Mosquitoes transmit malaria. Malaria is expensive to treat and if not treated can lead to death. Sleep under a treated mosquito net to avoid the cost of treating malaria.
Soak your beans before cooking. Soaked beans do no take long to get ready. This helps to reduce charcoal wastage saving you some money.

Whenever you earn money, Before you spend it on anything pay your self first. Pay yourself a certain amount of the money you just got. If what you paid yourself is enough to invest in any business, invest the money. If you wisely invest your money, it will make you more money. Seek advise from people with more knowledge than you about the business you want to invest in. And ask for advise from the right people. So you should never go to a pastor or a priest to ask for advise on how to run a hardware business. Unless this pastor or priest owns such a business.

Always keep a small percentage of all money that you earn as your savings. When these savings accumulate, invest them in a business. When this business starts making you money, save a small percentage of all money from this business. When this money accumulates, invest in another business and repeat the process.
